name: Artifacts and Antiquity
description:
After an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal from her previous line of work, our protagonist finds herself working security at the Stahl & Co. Shipping Company.
But soon a collection of strange artifacts cause the situation to take a dire turn...
* Note, time does not pass during dialog! So there's no need to rush.  :)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Like what I do and want to support the games?
Then please consider either donating here on Itch, or buying me a coffee!
https://ko-fi.com/zedtechnician
Every bit helps!
Can't? That's fine too! Hope you enjoy the game anyways.  :)
